titleStmt.title: The speeches and prayers of Major General Harison, Octob. 13. Mr. John Carew, Octob. 15. Mr. Justice Cooke, Mr. Hugh Peters, Octob. 16. Mr. Tho. Scott, Mr. Gregory Clement, Col. Adrian Scroop, Col. John Jones, Octob. 17. Col. Daniel Axtell, & Col. Fran. Hacker, Oct. 19 the times of their death. Together with severall occasionall speeches and passages in their imprisonment till they came to the place of execution. Faithfully and impartially collected for further satisfaction.

The speeches and prayers of Major General Harison, Octob. 13. Mr. John Carew, Octob. 15. Mr. Justice Cooke, Mr. Hugh Peters, Octob. 16. Mr. Tho. Scott, Mr. Gregory Clement, Col. Adrian Scroop, Col. John Jones, Octob. 17. Col. Daniel Axtell, & Col. Fran. Hacker, Oct. 19 the times of their death. Together with severall occasionall speeches and passages in their imprisonment till they came to the place of execution. Faithfully and impartially collected for further satisfaction.
titleStmt.author: Harrison, Thomas, 1606-1660, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Simon Dover and Thomas Creeke],

notesStmt.note: The words "Mr. Tho. Scott, .. Jones," are bracketed together on title page.
With a title-page quotation from Hebrews. Variant (Wing S4874B): lacking the quotation.
The speeches and prayers are spurious. Cf. 'Notes and queries', ser. 11, v.7 (1913), p. 301-2, whence also the printers' names.
Originally published the same year as: The speeches and prayers of some of the late King's judges.
Reproduction of the originals in the British Library and the Harvard University Library.
